meanings.definition: The system of writing in which symbols or characters represent ideas or concepts.
meanings.sent1: In some cultures, ideographies are used instead of letters to convey meaning.
meanings.sent2: She studied ancient ideographies to understand the history of communication.
meanings.sent3: The children created their own ideographies to write secret messages to each other.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a complex web of ideographies, each symbol representing a different thought.
meanings.sent5: The artist's painting was a beautiful ideography of love and unity.
